    MapWidget.OnVisibleChangedListener, MapWidget2.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener, AtakMapView.OnActionBarToggledListener, IPropertyBindingObject<IMapWidget>, ILayoutWidget, ILinearLayoutWidget, IMapWidget, IParentWidget

    RelockWidget, ScrollLayoutWidget
    @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="4.4")
public class LinearLayoutWidget
extends LayoutWidget
implements ILinearLayoutWidget, MapWidget.OnVisibleChangedListener, MapWidget2.OnWidgetSizeChangedListener
    Deprecated.
    Parent widget with functions similar to a LinearLayout view
